title: This is Rez Gravel, an Indigenous-Led Adventure Ride
content:
After being inspired by riding with other Indigenous cyclists at events like the Mid South and SBT GRVL, Gila River tribal member Elisha Bishop put on his own event.

Read the full article at This is Rez Gravel, an Indigenous-Led Adventure Ride on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
